Package edu.ncsu.csc216.wolf_tasks.model.tasks

Class Task

java.lang.Object
edu.ncsu.csc216.wolf_tasks.model.tasks.Task
All Implemented Interfaces:
Cloneable
public class Task extends Object implements Cloneable
Plain old Java object that represents a Task in the WolfTasks system.
Author:
Jaden Levy, Chirag Sreedhara

  • Constructor Details

    • Task

      public Task(String taskName, String taskDetails, boolean recurring, boolean active)
      Constructs a new task, given a name, description, whether it is recurring and whether it is active. If the task name or description is null or name is an empty string, an IllegalArgumentException is thrown.
      Parameters:
      taskName - the name to assign to the task
      taskDetails - the description to assign to the task
      recurring - whether the task is created as a recurring task
      active - whether the task is created as an active task

  • Method Details

    • getTaskName

      public String getTaskName()
      Gets the Task's name.
      Returns:
      the name of the Task

    • setTaskName

      public void setTaskName(String taskName)
      Sets the name of the Task. If the Task name is null or an empty string, an IllegalArgumentException is thrown.
      Parameters:
      taskName - the name to assign to the Task
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the Task name is null or an empty string

    • getTaskDescription

      public String getTaskDescription()
      Gets the Task's description.
      Returns:
      the Task's description

    • setTaskDescription

      public void setTaskDescription(String taskDescription)
      Sets the Task's description. If the Task description is null, an IllegalArgumentException is thrown.
      Parameters:
      taskDescription - the description to assign to the Task
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the Task name is null

    • isRecurring

      public boolean isRecurring()
      Gets whether the Task is recurring (if it would be added to the end of the Task list(s) upon completion).
      Returns:
      true if the Task is recurring, false otherwise

    • setRecurring

      public void setRecurring(boolean recurring)
      Sets the recurring status for the Task.
      Parameters:
      recurring - true if the Task is recurring, false otherwise

    • isActive

      public boolean isActive()
      Gets whether the Task is an active task (whether it would be added to the Active Tasks list).
      Returns:
      true if the Task is active, false otherwise

    • setActive

      public void setActive(boolean active)
      Sets the active status for the Task.
      Parameters:
      active - true if the Task is active, false otherwise

    • getTaskListName

      public String getTaskListName()
      Gets the name of the first AbstractTaskList this task belongs to. If the Task is not part of any AbstractTaskLists, an empty String is returned.
      Returns:
      the first AbstractTaskList this Task is a part of, or a blank String if not part of any AbstractTaskList

    • addTaskList

      public void addTaskList(AbstractTaskList taskList)
      Adds the Task to the AbstractTaskList, so long as the AbstractTaskList is not already registered with the Task. If the parameter is null, an IllegalArgumentException is thrown.
      Parameters:
      taskList - the TaskList to register with this Task
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the TaskList being attempted to register with this Task is null

    • completeTask

      public void completeTask()
      Completes the Task by notifying all registered AbstractTaskLists. The Task will be removed from all registered AbstractTaskLists, the count of completed Tasks will increment by one, and if the Task is recurring, the Task will be cloned and readded to registered TaskLists.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if there are no registered TaskLists associated with the Task

    • clone

      public Object clone() throws CloneNotSupportedException
      Clones the Task by creating a new Task with copies of all of its fields. If there are no TaskLists registered with the Task, a CloneNotSupportedException is thrown.
      Returns:
      a clone of the implicit Task with copies of all of the implicit Task's fields
      Throws:
      CloneNotSupportedException - if there are no TaskLists registered with this Task.

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Gets a String representation of the Task that will be used for file output.
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object
      Returns:
      String representation of the Task for file output
